evidence.claim: Payer Compass utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards, ensuring data security for health information.
Payer Compass supports various X12 transaction sets in their system.
The company implements FHIR standards for interoperability with healthcare systems.

icp.icp_reason: Payer Compass handles EDI transactions and X12 formats, indicating alignment with healthcare data exchange needs.
